# pd-sidebar

## Usage

```html
<pd-sidebar>
    <pd-sidebar-item text="Item 1"></pd-sidebar-item>
    <pd-sidebar-item text="Item 2"></pd-sidebar-item>
    <pd-sidebar-item text="Item 3" href="http://www.google.ch"></pd-sidebar-item>
</pd-sidebar>
```
